title: Horizon Technology Finance: An 8.46% Yield You Cannot Miss - Seeking Alpha
content: Horizon Technology Finance: An 8.46% Yield You Cannot Miss  Seeking Alpha
description: Buying HRZN at this price is for a bit more risk-takers because Horizon trades 1.23x its NAV per share. Prepayment risks are diminishing due to the rising interest rates. Read more here.
